title: Development of Microlearning Materials for Tourism English in Vocational High Schools

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English reading comprehension skills and foundational knowledge of the tourism industry
context.additional_context: Aims to cultivate practical English skills required in real-world tourism settings. Provides a flexible learning environment utilizing mobile devices

learning_goals: Students can independently interpret tourism-related English texts with over 80% accuracy
Learners can utilize professional terminology matching real-world travel agency scenarios with over 70% proficiency
All learners complete 85% or more of the developed microlearning content within three weeks
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
